mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.activity_id AS "activityId", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.sign AS "sign", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", u3.name AS "user.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u3 ON u3.id = a.user_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM cms_activity_enter a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.id LIKE '%'||#{id}||'%' '%'+#{id}+'%' concat('%',#{id},'%')
AND a.activity_id LIKE '%'||#{activityId}||'%' '%'+#{activityId}+'%' concat('%',#{activityId},'%')
AND a.user_id LIKE '%'||#{user.id}||'%' '%'+#{user.id}+'%' concat('%',#{user.id},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_activity_enter( id, activity_id, user_id, create_date, sign, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{activityId}, #{user.id}, #{createDate}, #{sign}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
